Edited January 4, 2015 by carlpilot
OrbHab2 is here!
Cool looking station...similar to the Russian station, Mir!

Nice station!

But I'd strongly suggest that you not upload every single screenshot - some more than once, it seems. Pick the highlights. And scenes that are illuminated (by the sun, or lights on the rocket or station) tend to be better received than ones that aren't.
I tend to agree, however, if you WANT to show the station at night, try to make them spectacular shots (s.a. showing off station lighting)

I send a space shuttle to Orbital Habitation in Part V:

Orbital Habitation 2 is here in 0.90-check the first post for details and pictures!

-Carlpilot

Looking good, but a Jumbo tank's a little much for an upper/tug stage, innit? How much fuel do you have left in that thing when it docks?

About 1/6 of the total fuel is left, so I just leave it in orbit.

-Carlpilot
